Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
CAN: May attempt to draw a plant shape but without clear details (basic outline of a plant without distinguishing features).
Might color some parts green to represent the plant, but without distinguishing between healthy and unhealthy plants (random green coloring without specific context).
CANNOT: Unable to show the difference between a healthy and unhealthy plant using water and light visually (no conceptual understanding of how water and light affect plant health).
Fails to depict wilted leaves, dry soil, or pale appearance of plants (lacks understanding of what those symptoms indicate).
Cannot illustrate or identify the effects of water and light through drawings or explanations (student does not understand the plant's needs).
